display_name: Women's Health Initiative Insomnia Rating Scale: Trouble getting back to sleep after waking too early
description:
Item from the Women's Health Initiative Insomnia Rating Scale. [Levine et al.(2003)](https://psycnet.apa.org/record/2003-06188-004)

[Search for all WHIIRS variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/bestair/variables?search=whiirs)

Original Question: Pick the answer that best describes how often you experienced the situation in the LAST 4 WEEKS. 7D. Did you have trouble getting back to sleep after you woke up too early?
